description: Loop exit point that decides whether to continue looping or exit. Tracks loop count and evaluates conditions to send value to loop_back or loop_end output.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: The current value being processed from the loop

inputs.name: loop_value
inputs.description: Value to send back to loop-start for next iteration. If not provided, uses 'value'

inputs.name: final_value
inputs.description: Value to save as final result when loop exits. If not provided, uses 'value'

inputs.name: loop_limit
inputs.description: Maximum number of times to loop before exiting (default: 10)

inputs.name: while_condition
inputs.description: Boolean condition to continue looping. Loop continues while true (default: true)

outputs.name: loop_back
outputs.description: Value sent back to loop start to continue iteration. Only outputs when loop should continue.

outputs.name: final_value
outputs.description: Final value when loop exits. Only outputs when loop is complete.

outputs.name: total_iterations
outputs.description: Total number of iterations that ran. Only outputs when loop is complete.

outputs.name: all_values
outputs.description: Array of all values that were processed through the loop. Only outputs when loop is complete.
